events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the size is completely wrong.
The customer reported a refund request due to incorrect size; case categorized under Refund cluster.
The case has been assigned to agent Emily for further assistance regarding the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process and make it as smooth as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has been opened or worn? This will help us process the refund quickly.
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new and still in the original packaging, never worn or opened.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund as soon as you ship the jacket back to us. I will send you a prepaid return label within the next email.
That sounds good, thanks! I appreciate the quick help and the prepaid label offer for returning the jacket.
We have received your return package and processed your refund successfully. The amount should be credited back to your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for your prompt and helpful support throughout the process!
We are closing this refund case as the customer has confirmed receipt of the refund and is satisfied with the resolution. Thank you for reaching out.
